Kizu wrote:
> aside from the beautiful artwork I cannot make a lot of
> sense to it by just trying to figure out what's happening through
> the images.

I'm thinking of setting up a fan site for some of these.  While full
translations seem a bit too daunting, I might put up detailed chapter by
chapter (or story by story in the case of Okita-Kirameki no Zanzou) plot
descriptions along with a "who's who" gallery with images of each
significant character.  Perhaps after reading a full summary, the books'
images would make more sense.  It would take me a while to get something set
up, but then I'll probably start with Getsu Mei Sei Ki and some of the
stories from Okita Souji - Kirameki no Zanzou, to be followed by Hokusou
Shinsengumi and later Burai and perhaps some of the others.  I'll post a
link once I have something to point it to.

Niwashi

p.s.  I just ordered Shinsengumi Hijikata Toshizou Mibu no Ginrou (the
companion volume to Shinsengumi Okita Souji Kirameki no Zanzou), the next
couple volumes of Getsu Mei Sei Ki, and the first volume of Onikami Shinsen.
With ground shipping from halfway around the world, I won't get them for a
month or so, but eventually I'll have a few more reviews to add.
